      • LocalizedGrid

        public LocalizedGrid(Grid grid,
                     double minX,
                     double minY,
                     double maxX,
                     double maxY)
        Create a new LocalizedGrid.
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid to localize.
        minX - the "real" minimum x.
        minY - the "real" minimum y.
        maxX - the "real" maximum x.
        maxY - the "real" maximum y.

        public static LocalizedGrid generateLocalizedGrid(double xScaling,
                                                  double yScaling,
                                                  double minX,
                                                  double minY,
                                                  double maxX,
                                                  double maxY)
        Create a new LocalizedGrid.
        Parameters:
        xScaling - the x scaling value.
        yScaling - the y scaling value.
        minX - the grid's minimum X value.
        minY - the grid's minimum Y value.
        maxX - the grid's maximum X value.
        maxY - the grid's maximum Y value.
        Returns:
        a new localized grid.
